rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/students-could-receive-an-extra-ps15-000-if-they-agree-to-become-teachers">     <title>Students could receive an extra \ufffd\ufffd15,000 if they agree to become teachers</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/students-could-receive-an-extra-ps15-000-if-they-agree-to-become-teachers</link>     <description>A new bursary will offer up to \ufffd\ufffd15,000 to maths or physics students who agree to become teachers after university.</description>     <dc:date>2015-03-11T16:11:50Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teacher-training-in-schools">     <title>Teacher training in schools</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teacher-training-in-schools</link>     <description>If you're keen to get into the classroom as soon as possible, school-based teacher training may be for you.</description>     <dc:date>2014-11-13T14:39:59Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teaching-in-private-schools">     <title>Teaching in private schools</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teaching-in-private-schools</link>     <description>There are big differences between teaching in independent and state schools. Find out about the most important ones here.</description>     <dc:date>2013-12-10T17:34:20Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/where-do-teachers-get-the-most-respect">     <title>Where do teachers get the most respect?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/where-do-teachers-get-the-most-respect</link>     <description>Teachers are among the most respected professions in China.</description>     <dc:date>2013-10-30T16:02:31Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/my-job-explained-secondary-school-teacher">     <title>My job explained: Secondary school teacher</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/my-job-explained-secondary-school-teacher</link>     <description>Harry Ingham is head of history at a secondary school in Croydon.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-15T12:40:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teaching-in-a-pupil-referral-unit">     <title>Teaching in a Pupil Referral Unit</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teaching-in-a-pupil-referral-unit</link>     <description>Working in a Pupil Referral Unit means you\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdll be helping children with problems much more difficult than their homework. </description>     <dc:date>2013-04-09T10:35:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/working-as-a-supply-teacher">     <title>Working as a supply teacher</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/working-as-a-supply-teacher</link>     <description>If you want to teach but a permanent job isn't for you, supply teaching could offer the flexibility you need.</description>     <dc:date>2013-02-05T17:10:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teaching-children-with-special-educational-needs">     <title>Teaching children with special educational needs</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teaching-children-with-special-educational-needs</link>     <description>Teaching children with special educational needs (SEN) is a specialist job with its own challenges and training. Find out how to get started.</description>     <dc:date>2013-01-16T16:20:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/career-profile-teaching-assistant">     <title>Career profile: Teaching Assistant</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/career-profile-teaching-assistant</link>     <description>Teaching assistants keep the classroom running smoothly and support children with particular needs.</description>     <dc:date>2013-01-14T16:30:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/student-finance-for-teachers">     <title>Student finance for teachers</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/student-finance-for-teachers</link>     <description>Interested in teaching but worried about money? Find out about the funding available for teacher training.</description>     <dc:date>2012-11-09T16:55:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/how-much-do-teachers-earn">     <title>How much do teachers earn?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/how-much-do-teachers-earn</link>     <description>Many people go into teaching out of passion - but it\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds still good to know how much you\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdll earn and where your career could take you.</description>     <dc:date>2012-01-26T16:55:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/non-teaching-jobs-in-schools">     <title>Non-teaching jobs in schools</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/non-teaching-jobs-in-schools</link>     <description>Find out about some of the jobs available in schools if you don't want to become a teacher.</description>     <dc:date>2011-10-29T14:55:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/who-would-be-your-perfect-teacher">     <title>Who would be your perfect teacher?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/who-would-be-your-perfect-teacher</link>     <description>Students have voted Harry Potter author JK Rowling and her fictional creation Albus Dumbledore as their perfect teachers, although their parents disagree...</description>     <dc:date>2011-09-19T12:54:27Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teach-first">     <title>Teach First</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teach-first</link>     <description>Think you\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdre up to working in some of Britain\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds most challenging schools? Then think about applying for the Teach First graduate training programme.</description>     <dc:date>2011-03-25T13:25:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/career-profile-secondary-school-teacher">     <title>Career profile: Secondary school teacher</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/career-profile-secondary-school-teacher</link>     <description>Are you passionate about a specific subject, highly disciplined and enjoy working with young people?</description>     <dc:date>2010-11-01T00:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/career-profile-primary-school-teacher">     <title>Career profile: Primary school teacher</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/career-profile-primary-school-teacher</link>     <description>Teaching primary school kids is all about having fun and finger-painting right? Wrong!</description>     <dc:date>2010-11-01T00:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/my-job-explained-primary-school-teacher">     <title>My job explained: Primary school teacher</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/my-job-explained-primary-school-teacher</link>     <description>Jo Stanley teaches 9- to 10- year olds. Here she talks honestly about the job: the pay, training, long hours and holidays.</description>     <dc:date>2010-11-01T00:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/postgraduate-certificate-in-education-pgce">     <title>Postgraduate certificate in education (PGCE)</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/postgraduate-certificate-in-education-pgce</link>     <description>The PGCE is one of several qualifications you can do once you have already completed a degree.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T17:50:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teaching-degree-courses">     <title>Teaching degree courses</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/teaching-degree-courses</link>     <description>Studying an undergraduate teaching degree is often the most direct route into teaching. </description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T17:50:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/how-do-i-get-into-teaching">     <title>How do I get into teaching?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/teaching/how-do-i-get-into-teaching</link>     <description>Are you a good communicator? Do you have bags of enthusiasm and a burning desire to make a difference? If so then a teaching career may be for you.</description>     <dc:date>2010-08-31T17:50:00Z</dc:date>   </item> </rdf:RDF>
